title: Simple Tomato Pasta
instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook according to package directions.
2. While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant (about 1 minute).
3. Pour in chopped tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Drain pasta, reserving about 1/2 cup of pasta water. Add drained pasta to the tomato sauce.
5. If sauce is too thick, add a splash of reserved pasta water until desired consistency is reached.
6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil if desired.

title: Shoulder Egg
instructions:
Bring water to the boil
add a pinch of salt
put egg in boiling water
boil for about 2 - 3 mins 
remove and serve.

title: Boiled egg
instructions:
boil water
put egg in water
boil for about 2 to 3 mins
butter bread
remove egg from water and sever.

title: Jam Sandwich
instructions:
Butter the two slices of bread
Butter the bread with jam of your choice.
Place the buttered and spread of jam side of the bread together.
Place on a plate. Eat and enjoy!
